about.blurb: Software Developer (SDE) focused on full-stack web development, strong fundamentals in DSA/OS/DBMS, and hands-on experience building real-time and data-driven apps.

experience.title: Software Development Intern
highlights: Built a Student Performance Analytics Dashboard for tracking learner engagement and outcomes.
Implemented interactive visualizations in React (Chart.js) reducing analysis time by ~40%.
Supported deployments using Vercel, Render, and MongoDB Atlas.

experience.title: Web Development Intern — Best Performer
highlights: Completed a 15-day intensive track to strengthen core web dev skills.
Built 'GitHub Explorer' using REST APIs and MongoDB to analyze repos and user profiles.

projects.name: Prediction Market Exchange
projects.summary: Real-time trading platform for prediction markets with scalable backend.
highlights: Custom order-matching system and portfolio tracker.
AI-based market creation for trending events.
Secure auth with JWT and live WebSocket updates.

projects.name: Real-Time Focus Master – Productivity Web App
highlights: Optimized rendering with React.memo; persistent state via localStorage.
Responsive UI, dark mode, accessibility built-in.

projects.name: Driver’s Drowsiness Detection System
projects.summary: Real-time drowsiness detection using CNN-based YOLO models.
highlights: Detected eye closure & yawning on video stream in real-time.

education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering
